lang_changed: Language has been changed to English.
user_info: USER INFO ID: {user_id} First Name: {first_name} Last Name: {last_name} Username: @{username} Is Bot: {is_bot} Is Scam: {is_scam} Is Fake: {is_fake} Language Code: {lang_code} Link: {user_link}
join_vc_failed_no_vc: No active voice chat found in this group.
join_vc_failed_timeout: Timeout Error Failed to join the voice chat. Your account may be temporarily restricted by Telegram (FloodWait). Please try again in a few hours.
join_vc_failed_floodwait: Flood Wait Telegram has restricted this action. Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.
help_text: Userbot Help Menu GENERAL .help - Shows this help message. .ping - Checks if the userbot is alive. .info - Gets user information. .lang - Changes the bot's language. .stats - Shows system statistics. .afk - Sets an AFK status. .pfp - Downloads user's profile pictures. VOICE CHAT .joinvc - Joins the group voice chat. .leavevc - Leaves the group voice chat. MODERATION .purge - Deletes messages in bulk. BROADCAST .bc - Broadcasts a replied message. .excludebc - Excludes a group from broadcast. .includebc - Includes a group for broadcast.

bc_exclude_removed: ‚úÖ This group has been removed from the broadcast blacklist.
